skillTree.name: Squiggyback
skillTree.description: Gnoblars take part in may obscure and dangerous sports; among the most popular of these is "squig jousting". Two Gnoblars sit across from each other on the backs of squigs and charge at each other in an attempt to unseat their opponents.

skillTree.name: Iron Discipline
skillTree.description: Rule number one of being a leader is to be far more terrifying than the next braggard who thinks they ought to take your place.

skillTree.name: Tithe-Taker
skillTree.description: It is not enough to impose military defeat upon the foe, they must be brought to their knees through punitive taxationâ€¦ unless they'd rather get in the meat-pot instead?

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Blessed by the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.

skillTree.name: Greased Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Step 1: Grease up your Gnoblars! Step 2: Go faster!

skillTree.name: Sneaky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: You have to watch 'em, as there's no telling what malicious schemes those wickedly cunning Gnoblars might enact.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sneakin' Off
skillTree.description: A smart Head Honcho knows when the fight is going against him. And it's not like he cares about the other Gnoblars much, anyway

skillTree.name: Bigga Sticka
skillTree.description: If there's one thing a Gnoblar has learned from Ogres, it's that bigga is betta... especially when it comes to the size of your tool

skillTree.name: Tiefstone
skillTree.description: Tiefstones attract magic, ye see? And magic that hits a tiefstone goes places other than the Honcho holding it

skillTree.name: Bigga 'elm
skillTree.description: Gnoblar leaders like to wear large helms and hats, symbolizing their status and authority. This one is covered with spikes, horns, and tokens of good luck

skillTree.name: We'z Winnin!
skillTree.description: The best way to win a fight is to be winning a fight.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: We'z Harda
skillTree.description: Smart Gnoblars grab bits of metal and wood and tie it to their bodies. It makes em harda.

effects.description:
Armour: +3 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Deadlia
skillTree.description: Some Head Honchos train their Gnoblars. Makes em know when to stab

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +2 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +4 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Rocka
skillTree.description: Survive enough fights, and sometimes a Gnoblar learns how to fight back

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +2 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +4 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Fasta
skillTree.description: Runnin' from Ogres is good training for runnin' from other enemies

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Tougha
skillTree.description: No matter how many Gnoblars die, there's always more of the little buggers

effects.description:
Replenishment: +3% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Replenishment: +6% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Replenishment: +9% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Smarta
skillTree.description: The brightest of the Gnoblars know that they never have to get into melee combat. They can just chuck sharp things from a safe distance

effects.description:
Missile Strength: +3% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +6% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +9% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Stabbia
skillTree.description: Where there's a weak point, there's a Gnoblar with a sharp stick.

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +3% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rhinox Horn
skillTree.description: When a Rhinox is slain in battle, its horns are sawn off from its dead carcass, hollowed out, and turn into instruments of war

skillTree.name: We'z Surprisin'
skillTree.description: There's so many damn Gnoblars, they're always somewhere you don't expect them to be

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Sneakin'
skillTree.description: No matter how many Gnoblars you think you've seen, there's always more

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Dodgin'
skillTree.description: Knowing when to dodge an opponent's attack is a skill a Gnoblar learns very early in life. Or it becomes food.

effects.description:
Physical Resist: +10% for all Gnoblar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We'z Leet!
skillTree.description: Every Gnoblar knows, as long as the enemy can't reach you, you're safe.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.name: Bigga Rhinox Horn
skillTree.description: When a Rhinox is slain in battle, its horns are sawn off from its dead carcass, hollowed out, and turn into instruments of war. And if the horn is really big, when played it makes all the Gnoblars just a little bit excited

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Hardy
skillTree.description: One can never go hungry on a long march for as long as there are captives for the meat-pot.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lovely Jubbly
skillTree.description: Even Ogres are capable of forward planning, especially when it comes to precious loot.

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Brutish Enforcers
skillTree.description: The grumblings of unrest tend to quiet when under threat of being crushed and eaten.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Deboner
backgroundSkills.description: Butchery is an art. This one knows how to extract every last morsel worth eating from a carcass, leaving only bones behind them.

backgroundSkills.name: Farter
backgroundSkills.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

backgroundSkills.name: Flabby
backgroundSkills.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Daddy
backgroundSkills.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

backgroundSkills.name: Maw Preacher
backgroundSkills.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."
